Reviews.Title: great for price
Reviews.Author: A. A. Merlo
Reviews.Content: for the price this is a very good deal. installed camera quickly. adjustments could be easier for pointing but just takes a little more effort. video quality good and bold, and night vision very good. automatically adjusts for items close by not washing out those at a distance. audio works well too. have issues with my DVR software recording audio, may be user error, but mic works well, not cameras fault. admittedly there weren't many choices for a camera in this range with audio, but it worked out well. if i need another i would buy it again. easily 5 stars for performance at this price.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Capt512
Reviews.Content: I went through several of these before getting four good ones to go around my house. I don't think quality control is the greatest but customer service from Beach Audio where I got mine was excellent and they exchanged bad ones for good ones with little hassle. Audio as well as day and night vision is excellent.Only real complaint I have is that the cable coming out of the camera is pretty short so if your running the cable through a wall or like me trying to hide it behind siding etc. it can be a pain.This are hard to find now so if your looking for a fairly inexpensive audio / video camera I would probably recommend this one IF your able to get it from someone who offers a refund or exchange program.

Reviews.Title: Great Survelliance
Reviews.Author: Carolyn J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Great reception - I am using this monitor in my apartment parking lot and I can see very clearly, even during the night what is going on.
